column5: Has anyone else seen Jim Saric mention OFC in one of those "I don't fish for a living, I live to fish" spots?
yup, sounds like he said on the internet you got the Ontario Fishing Network for info and feed back
That's pretty cool.... I thought I heard something to that effect too... But all I could find on WFN was this one.  http://www.wfn.tv/video/video.php?video=401803  RFS

Yup, pointed that out t my dad yesterday when we saw the commercial. Speaking of witch, sorry JP we all love ya here but get WFN to take that dam Owner Softbaits commercial off the air or atleast not 1000 times a day.   Maybe I need less WFN

OK got it   here it is hope they don't mind  <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value=" <object width="425" height="344"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vSvEAHZ2rmQ&hl=en&fs=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vSvEAHZ2rmQ&hl=en&fs=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"></embed></object>
I wonder what Jim's OFC name is?
*sigh* Ok, ok, you got me, my secret is out. I am Jim. I just don't post any of my giant muskie pics here so the rest of you don't get jealous.
I also saw that two day and thought did I just here what I think I thought I heard well after Terry's post i guess I did here what I thought I heard.  Very cool to get a plug like that on WFN.
